conditions.recommendation_above: For voltages above 36 kV, a high-voltage transformer is required.

conditions.recommendation_below: For capacities below 500 kVA, a compact distribution transformer is sufficient.
conditions.recommendation_between: For capacities between 500 kVA and 5 MVA, a standard power transformer is recommended.
conditions.recommendation_above: For capacities above 5 MVA, a high-capacity transformer is required.
